channel.title: Interesting Jagex stuffs
channel.description: Well recently i went to staffordshire university for an interview to do a games development and programming course and we are required to do a sandwhich course with a one year placement at a games development studio, one of the partners of the university is none other than jagex. The man who was giving the talk said that a few students go there and they always come back saying its a tough place to work, they monitor the amount of keystrokes each employee makes to make sure they're hitting their target to get paid the amount of money they are meant to and its pretty much like a prison in there, they said that they dont envy any of the students that get sent there for their placement year. I found this interesting :p who knew jagex were such harsh bastards to their employees

item.description:
@lothy wrote:

abraham2119:

aaaaaand thats how you become a multi-billionaire company

Don’t kid yourself. Andrew (well, his studio) is worth millions, but certainly not billions.

Regarding the OP’s post though, that does sound quite petty. It’s certainly useless for measuring the quality of work being completed.
